values:
man, how things have changed. i read all of my entries and how i thought things were big deals back then, and i look at it now, and it was really nothing. that makes me giggle.

right now i am chillin, i have work tomorrow at 830, but i really dont wanna go. i am kinda depressed. i did something really stupid and i'll tell you about it.

well i was with this guy - kinda- over the school year. we were FWB, and i liked him and i figured since that was the only way i could be with him, i would be that. but doin that i started to like him a lot. and i fell for him. i cared about him a lot. but he just outta a relationship and he didnt want anything. i understood, but it seemed like everytime it would come time to be serious he'd make up something to not do it. for example, he left to florida and told me he liked me a lot and i said why didnt you try anything than, and he said bcz he knew he was going to FL, and i said but i thought you didnt want anything bcz you just got outta a relationship, and he said no that was 1st semester. and i said, that makes no sense how that has anything to do with anything bcz you said you didnt want anything, and then you did, but now you say you cant bcz you knew you were going to FL. i feel that he was just making up excuses so he didnt have to be with me. i think if you wanna be with me, than be with me, stop making stuff up just to make yourself look better. thats what my dad does and i hate it. i wanna meet someone whos not gonna pull stuff outta there ass. 

but i like him, he's a really great guy but this is why he doesnt wanna be with me at all anymore...

over MDW i hooked up with another guy, and i told him thinking he would handle it well --i was wrong-- but i thought he could bcz HE ASKED WHAT HAPPENED....but anyways...so i told him and he got mad and didnt talk to me for 2 weeks about maybe 3. so i was going insane bcz i didnt talk to him...i found out he really liked me and i was like how was i supposed to know you didnt tell me about it. the only way i'd be able to tell is through our actions, but a lotta ppl just act and dont mean it, so how should i know? but apparently he liked me a lot and whatever so i blew that chance. and i really did like him, he was someone i could see myself with, braggin to everyone, and i was happy when i was with him. there's not many ppl who make me happy. i am a person who either likes you or doesnt. after one month if i am still with you, and the one obsessed over you than you dont have to question my feelings for you, but if its been a month and dump you, i never liked you. but its like i had good times with him...but then at the same time i feel like i am making the average times into great times just bcz i cant be with him and i am trying to make myself fall for him and change the way he feels. soooo...he moved to FL for school, right? well he is coming back now, and bcz of the whole thing i did, he doesnt wanna come back but he has to for family reasons, but whatever, i wanna start over, but he doesnt and that makes me mad bcz i wanna try something, maybe it will work. but i feel bcz i messed up he is trying to make up reasons to get rid of me so he can go get with some hott girl and show her off or something...but whateverrr....i dunno. i just wanna be happy and i feel that if i am with someone i care about i can make them happy while me being with them makes me happy. when i am with someone i care about, i do anything in my power to make them happy. i do the cute lil couples things. like buying cute little things and surprizes and gifts and stuff. but i havent had that in a while. so i dunno. 

i wanna make things work with him, but i feel like he wants nothing to do with me, and bcz he's pushing me away, me the dumb girl wants him more. its stupid. but i wanna make things work and i wanna show him i can do this. you know?

but anyways...Ian has a new gf and im upset about that...he's my first love you know? you'll always remember your first love, but i just cant get over the fact that me and him never worked out or tried to be worked out. i wanna try bcz i feel like someone will work. i can see me marrying him, but now he's with another girl, i cant do anything about it. but its okay, i am not gonna wait for him, bcz he's not waiting for me. so i am moving on, but of course keeping him in my heart, bcz he was my best friend and my first love, so he is special to me, and always will be. =)

so now, ray fumero, my ex-fling from last summer, is tryin to start things up again with me. its like, i gave you friggen 3 chances already, you couldn't make it work any of the 3?! its like i messed up the first time, i gave you a 2nd chance you messed up and the 3rd time you messed up again....it shouldnt take a person 4 times to realize they "really like someone and wants to make it work" they should know from the beginning and act like it FROM THE BEGINNING! you know? but whatever....he wants to talk and explain, and i say fine, you can come to my house and talk to me, and he never follows through, so why the F do i want someone who i cant rely on? WHY? it makes no sence, if i cant rely on you to come to my house just for you to explain what you did wrong to try to win me back, then how do you think i am going to rely on you for anything else? you're crazy.  if winning me back is so important to you than you should be at my house right when you say you're gonna be there and you should try everything in your way to talk to me and not "fall asleep" 2 mins later after talkin to me...i guess its not that friggen important than....thats why i said..."stop wasting your time and mine on something that is obviously not important to you. just let it be" but he wont stop...but he not doin anything anyways....but whatever.rrrrrrrrr....

so yea...im bummed...i want Fernando, and i want Ian, but i cant have either. life stinks. i will justt stay single. 

after my mistake with Fernando, i will wait for him. because i'd really like to see something florish with him. =]

as for now, im going to work out and then shower and then knock out bcz i have to be at work at 830 and wake up 730. 

Goodnight. <3

i dont get it. right when i think everything is going to work out either something does happen against my behalf or i just think something bad has happened. i dont know which one it is. until i do find out im going to be a nervous wreck. i dunno how i should think because for the past two weeks he was acting one way and then tonight i dont know if it was just a bad night or something but he was just acting weird. so i dont know how to take it. mayb it was just a tonight thing. i hope. im also tryin to figure out whats going down here. no one can figure it out. everyone helps me out, supports me, and gives me advice but when it comes time to doing this advice, i dont have the balls to do it. its good advice but i dont wanna rush ne thing, make myself look like an ass so i can never talk to him again, or just do ne thing wrong generally. my school work is lagging. im trying to stay up in my studies but there is so much going through my mind. i thought this would be simple just having him there to chill with, but not being with him completly makes it worse bcz then i think about that all the time. i think that if we were together it would b easier bcz i wouldnt have to worry about what he wants what hes thinking etc. there would b bumps, but im willing to work them out. the crazy thing is, is that im waiting for him, and i never wait for ne one. i get what i want and then i leave, but im waiting for him. i feel like there is something there but i dont want to miss judge this and then have nothing out of it. "..but my heart keeps falling faster.." is a good quote right now. i just want to know what hes thinking. what he wants. etc. and if hes just toying with me then it will be over but if he wants something then ill be here. i want something to work out. *lauren committing, crazy thought* but i dunno. i dont want to push it but at the same time i dont want to hold it too loose and let it get away. tough calls are going to be going on right about now, and the next few decisions will be desiding the outcome of the future.

-until next time. im dead tired and im goind to sleep. gimme some advice if u think u can help. id love it. good night. <3

this week we only had school on monday and wednesday. today i had a bunch of plans and then my mom had to take my bro to the airport so now im stuck home, all day. she wont b home until 8ish. which sucks bcz i cant go out and i can have ppl over but no one can chill. soooooooo. id go out, but i was bribed that if i didnt go out id get something. so im wont. =]

school's been getting better. right now im doing really good in my classes. my d+ went up at a b. so im SUPER happy. and now im doing good in school. the only thing i gotta worry about now, is chemistry with MRS THURING! i dont like her much, but with the help of some friends i think i can do this. =]

guyz r cool right now. i have a lot of friends supporting me and helping me out. and without them i dont think i would b able to do this. but i got my eye on *someone* and hopefully all will go well. and with their help, it definetly will! lol. but its all good though. were good friends. so it'll b all good.

but oh yea, tonight im sleeping over mai's! yay! i cant wait. i just gotta wait til about 1030 when she gets home from work n then its gonna b awesome! a lot to catch up on and an all night party. 

tomorrow ima b chillin with a big group of ppl and hopefully ill have a lot of fun. im gonna go tanning and then go out all night. yay. i need a night out and have lots of fun. until next time. <3

i havent written in a while, as u can see. somethings r new. but im not gonna talk about that, it goes way to far back.

im on the dance team and the girls on the team r super sweet. they r all nice and funny. yet the dance team is not organized i still think that if the girls stick with it, it will b fun.

vanessa had her sweet 16 last friday the 15. it was a lot of fun. i thought it was going to b better, but it was still great. they had yummie food and everyone was wild and was dancing. her candles were sweet and they had a lot of sentiment to them. i got one! lol. it was a fun night and im happy i went.

mrs boan went away to florida and i was supposed to be mrs boan and watch her kids and everything while she was gone. it was supposed to b from the 6th of october until tomorrow, but she got home sick and came home on the 14th. i was very happy that she came home, bcz that was too much for me. and now everything is back to normal. =]

school is pretty good except for math. im gettin a d+ and im not happy at all. im trying to switch outta it but i wanna b 100% sure that i wanna switch b4 i do it. i have a good gpa and i dont wanna mess it up with that one horrible grade.

guyzz..over the summer i was in florida so no one was in mind. then school came n i thought i had someone but..i was wrong. then i went out with chrys for a couple weeks but it was bad bcz we were both super busy and right wen we stopped, everything was normal again and we werent busy ne more. it was dumb. but i dunno mayb it was supposed to happen. right now im just chillin trying to settle down and have a serious b/f, so until it happens, ima b chillin.

my weekend..friday i went to clark at 5 and went to the pit and met up with chrys peter and these two other guys. i played chrys one on one and i broke a nail. lol. and then we did suisides. we got really bored so we got the radio and chrys went home and got cards n cookies and we played blackjack n bet with cookies. of course, i lost. lol. but it was still fun. and then harold came. and him n chrys played one on one and me n peter went and played spit. he was winning but then he got too cold n quit. hehe. and then we chilled at chrys's for a bit and then his family came for his brother birthday party so we left bcz he sed he didnt think we could b there. so we went to the TC for the bathroom. and then he called us and sed oh u can come now. so then we walk ALL the way back to his house and watched hardball, at some comida, and then danced in the strobe light. lol it was fun.

saturday i went to marinas house and then got my pictures. they all turned out good. they were all pretty! and then i chilled with michael at my house. we put my pictures on my walls and then went to friendlys. we met up with harold and then walked around clark all night. it was an okay night, but it felt never ending. 

right now im just chillin i have a lot of things to do but i dont feel like doing it. so until then ima b lazy and do nothing. mais supposed to b comming over and shes gonna check out my room. so ima b bored. but i had a long week. 

<3
laura doesnt update enough so i am going to throw this in her to scare her into updating. who am i? im not telling. figure it out.

i came back to new jersey on sunday. since then i have been super busy. i've been chillin with mai, michael, marina, ian, nick, and a few other people. it been really fun. 

mai and i had a sleep over at my house. it was super fun. at first we were chillin at my house walkin around. then we went to weight watchers. and then she went to a birthday party. after that we went to 711 met up with ian joe n chrys and then played Karayoke Revolution 2. it was amazing! lol. and then we went back to my house and played Need For Speed Underground. that was amazing. we pigged out like crazy!! *while you were playing i kept eating!!* lol i <3 u mai. 

tuesday i chilled with michael. i had a blast. we went for a walk with my mom and i met Queenie. she is ssooo cute, but she jumps a lot. lol. we walked alllll the way to clark. almost got killed at the pigion tunnel(or something like that) that was superrr scary. and then i met up with mike zeiser. i havent seen him in foreverrr. and then we went to wendys and met up with marina. and then walked are butts home with marina all upset talkin about BOYS and LOVE. lol. fun tho.

wednesday i went to KIM*S house! it was soooo cool. we played pool, watch pilots nub! lolol. look threw mags, and watch Mikayla. cute lil girl. then i went to chill with ian and then i met up with marina nick kyle john kuna and ian romanello. it was kinda boring but, it happens.

today i woke up at 930, went to the mall til 330. shopped til i dropped. went to computer USA danced in the isles with marina. lol. and then came home cleaned my room. went for a walk and then chilled until now with some of marinas friends. i had a really good time. i chilled in a park looking at NYC and the stars perfectly. it was perrtyful. 

right now just chillin making my plans for tomorrow. hopefulyl tomorrow goes well. i have to relax lisas hair, chill with my cuzin, and then chill with tommmmmmmmmmieeeee D. lol. until next time. night night <3

awwwie shooooot. im in florida right now. it is soo fun so far. i went to the beach and many pools. i was supposed to only b staying for the weekend but i decided to stay for 2 more weeks so my daddy changed the ticket. yay. im going to b home on the 29th. so if u wanna chill the last week of summer, lemme know and we can make plans. it will b a blast. 

i dont have ne sources(sp check) to NJ from here except for my cuzins fone. i left my fone in NJ and they dont have a computer in any of the houses. im at the office right now. so if i wanna talk to someone i can use Janets fone or come to the office and sneek online. teehee. 

this weekend im going to universal studios with all of my cuzins! im soo excited. ive never been there before. so im super excited to see how everything is.

i miss everyone soo much. i cant wait to go home and chill with everyone and just b soo happy that im home with them. just two more weeks and i can be there. but until then, ima b here. well i gtg. ima update soon.

<3

i just got finished packing for florida in the morning. im going until sunday. im pretty excited but i dont know if the weather is gonna b good. right now they're saying that there is going to be hurricanes. so that doesnt sound too good. hopefully my family will make it worth while. i havent seen them in a year.

right now im talkin to ian. he needs sponsors for his football thing. lol. im not tired. i gotta wake up at like 9. poo. 

ima go n chill for a bit. <3

yesterday i went to garwood and saw ian and marina for a couple minutes. i havent seen ian in 3 weeks and marina in a week. i miss everyone in garwood! i wanted to see mai so bad but she was in NYC with her daddy. i havent seen her since june, when i get back, we're having a sleep over.

After garwood i went to elizabeth to visit my grandmothers friend Jesus. He's a lot older now, but thank god he is doing well. lilly and gracie came there and met up with us. we chilled there for a bit and then it was time to cisit other friends.

We left elizabeth and went to union city. it was a fun drive bcz i got to ride with lily and grace. there were so many spanish people in union city. i liked it bcz it was so different from garwood and my dads house. more excting. lol. ian called me and told me i was right by north bergan. i was like 'really?' i was gonna go visit neil but he didnt pick up his fone. so we just ended up chilling at minga and pepe's house. it was alright i guess. 

When we left their house we drove around and looked for a resturant to eat at. us girls were followed by 3 different guys in the short time that we were looking for a place. i was like whhaaat? i didnt think ne one actually did that. well silly me. they do. wen we found the place it was a cuban cuisine restuarant. it was really nice there.

at the table next to me there was this guy with the most gorgeous blue eyes ever. he was cuban and cute. two great combos. lol. we kept lookin at eachother. *eye contact* the most important thing about getting a girl/guy.i couldnt help myself but look. lol. and then right wen he left, he looked back at me and gave me a big smile. =] lol. 

We left the restuarant and just drove home. i slept the whole ride home. 

right now im talkin to mai. shes too funny. lol. ronnie. we're planning a sleepover for wen i come home. i cant wait. its gonna b the best reunion ever. lol. chis. corn rows. lol. africans with babies. lol. 

Numerology.

* #6 - The Romantic.

6's are idealistic and need to feel useful to b happy. A strong family connection is important to them. Their actions influence their decisions. They have a strong urge to take care of others and to help. They are very loyal and make great teachers. They like art or music. They make loyal friends who take friendship seriously. 6's should learn to differenciate between what they can change and what they can not.

the pictures came out soo cute. alaina is so photogenic. we took 10 pictures and i couldnt help but get a sample of all of them. if ya wanna see lemme kno. ill gladly show u them.

i bought a dress at the mall for the pictures because i didnt have ne nice clothes. lol. my daddy didnt buy me shoes so in all of the pictures they cut out my feets! lol. but its all good bcz they were all perrrrty. i dunno when but mayb next weekend we're going to go to JC Penny's and get more pictures taken because they take better pictures. but by the time we got to JC Penny's today, they were closed. but its okay. theres always next time. 

i just called ian and i found out that everything is okay. lol. that is was joe that i was fighting with. dumb me. but i guess everything is alright now. no friction. lol

<3

new layout. i hope ya like. but it wouldnt b possible without the help from Ryan Yorke and Mai Kousaka! Thank you guys!You're awesome!! 

im about to leave to get pictures with my sisters and my grandma. i hope all goes well.

last night i got into a fight with ian. i wonder how its gonna b today. lol. sorry for 'misleading' you. i just wont talk about 'that' ne more. ill let it just happen. lol. sorry sweetie.

<3

i wrote an entire entry and then it got erased. so ill briefly rewrite it.

today i was supposed to wake up at 930 bcz the of the cleaning ladies and then to take my sister to gymboree but lisa was a sweetheart and let me sleep til 3. how nice of her. i had a talk with her and she is such a pleasent woman. and i knew she wasnt happy with daddys golf. we were gonna out to the mall bcz daddy was out all day but my grandma wasnt feeling well so we just stayed home. lisa cooked dinner while alaina was sleeping and me and alyssa were in the backyard on the swings. we ate and then alyssa started hysterically crying bcz she thought she saw a snake. so lisa went right upstairs. so for her i cleaned up everything so she wouldnt have a mess. i hope she likes it! lol

you're wack. how can u try to tell me i did something that i didnt do? u just go and assume that i did it. you should really do research before you attack a person with incorrect information. you just make yourself look like an ASS. i guess now u can 'have a reason' to not like me for real. dork.

tomorrow im going to take professional pictures with alaina and alyssa. it should b fun. i hope everything goes well and the pictures dont come out bad. lol. well, until next time <3

on friday i went to go pick up marina. the drive was long. 2 hours there 2 hours back. but it was fun. marina and i we're trying to immatate really bad singers and making fun of ppl while singing mariah carrey. it was fun. my dad got a kick outta it. and we kept him awake. when she got here i gave her a tore of the house and we ate some pizza. it was yummie. we watched dirty dancing havana nights too. she loved it. first words outta her mouth wen the movie was over "lets watch it again" lol. its a great movie. that was time # 9. then we got ready for bed and talked and chilled and stuff. lol. 

Saturday we woke up and had cereal and chilled for a bit. we called my friend steve and asked him if he wanted to come with us to the mall and he was like suree. and so we were there. it took forever for us to get ready. lol. wen we got to the mall we walked into every shoe store. this guy damon went up to me and sed 'i really like your shoes. they r really nice. and if u need any help u can ask me' i was like hehe cool. lol. and so we were walkin around the store and this other guy started hitting on marina so i walked away lol. the guy damon was cute. he got my number. lol. and then we walked around the mall dragging steve everywhere. me and marina tried on a bunch of dresses and it was sooo fun! steve was helping us pic out the dresses. lol it was funny. we were talking pictures of our favorite outfits. lol. funny stuff. i bought a brooklyn dress and twinkie underwears. they r soo cute. lol. after the mall we dropped off steve and then we went to the movies. we saw the note book. it was a good movie but the people around us were soo rude, having their cellfones ring, talking, laughing, everything. it was annoying. it ruined the movie for me a bit. but i got over it.

sunday we woke up late and made ourselves a huge breakfast! it was great. she experianced REAL coffee. she sed it was too strong but its just the amazing cuban coffee. its good stuff. she had cafe con leche instead of just cafe. after breakfast we called steve to see if he wanted to chill for a lil. he came over and we ate pop rocks went on the computer and cleaned the chair my sister wrote on. lol. oops. it came out tho. thank god. and then key called me and wanted to see marina. he came over for a bit and then daddy was like 'we gotta go' so then they all left. and it was about a 2 and a half hour drive there and then it was 3 n a half hour drive back. there was soo much traffic. it was insane. but it was so fun with marina here. i havent seen her in so long so i guess thats what made it even more fun. when i come back from florida she might b staying here for a week! that should b fun as hell. and we can just chill all the time. it would b great.

now ima go chill for a bit..<3

Fill this out plz =]

1.) Who are you? 
2.) Are we friends?
3.) When and how did we meet?
4.) How have I affected you?
5.) What do you think of me? 
6.) What's the fondest memory you have of me?
7.) How long do you think we will be friends?
8.) Do you love me?
9.) Do you have a crush on me?
10.) Would you kiss me? 
11.) Would you hug me?
12.) Physically, what stands out?
13.) Emotionally, what stands out?
14.) Do you wish I was cooler?
15.) On a scale of 1-10, how hot am I?
16.) Give me a nickname and explain why you picked it. 
17.) Am I lovable?
18.) How long have you known me? 
19.) Describe me in one word. 
20.) What was your first impression? 
21.) Do you still think that way about me now? 
22.) What do you think my weakness is? 
23.) Do you think I'll get married? 
24.) What makes me happy? 
25.) What makes me sad? 
26.) What reminds you of me?
27.) If you could give me anything what would it be?
28.) How well do you know me? 
29.) When's the last time you saw me? 
30.) Ever wanted to tell me something but couldn't?
31.) Do you think I could kill someone?
32.) Do you think our friendship is getting stronger/weaker/or staying the same?
33.) Do you feel that you could talk to me about anything and I would listen?
34.) Are you going to put this on your Deadjournal and see what I say about you?

my daddy bought me Dirty Dancing Havana Nights last night. i can finally watch it as much as i want now. lol. 

today i went golfing with my daddy. it was alright. i had to watch my lil sister. she has too much energy. i cant even keep up with her. 

this morning i went in the backyard and sun tanned for about a half hour. it gets boring i need something to do or ill fall asleep. the last time i was bored in the sun fell asleep and woke up with the WORST sunburn. it was SO painful. i believe i got sun poisoning too. :-\ it was bad.

tomorrow i gotta wake up at 930 again. the cleaning ladies r comming. lovely. and then i have a long day ahead of me. we're going to pick up marina for the weekend. this should b fun! we're going to see the movie The Notebook and we're gonna chill with my friends that i made down here and we're also gonna have a ladies night out. Lisa, Marina and Me. that should b really fun. and then wen we bring her back i get to garwood we're gonna b visiting dan's family. this should b interesting. lol. 

until next time..<33

i started dancing last night. my dad is teaching me how to salsa. its fun so far and im ready to learn the next step. 

im getting into more spanish music. its actually very intersting stuff. the way all the instruments go together so well. lol. good stuff. 

today im doing nothing again. it is such an ugly day out. it was pouring before. but now it is just ugly, cloudy, and dark. so ill b dancing all night again. steve is in trouble for sleeping late today, so i cant chill with him. ill learn some more dancing i guess. 

its still getting higher, but ive watched dirty dancing havana nights 6 times now. to me, its that good. but to others it may not affect them like it is me. but um, its good stuff. im definetly buying the movie and the cound track. they have good songs on it. so its worth it. i have a lot of people to teach now that im learning. =]

wen i go back to north jersy im going to enroll myself in salsa classes. that should be fun.

the days are counting down until marina comes here. im pretty excited. on sunday wen we go back to drop her home we're going to b visiting all my grandmothers friends. and then we're going to b going to dan chavez's house to visit his family. cuban families are like that. lol. that should b interesting. i talk to his grandma and he talks to mine. we're like family now. lol. i cant wait but i have a feeling its going to get very awkward. hopefully not.

dinner time at the lopez residence..<33

When there's a problem..'You have a choice. You can do nothing, u can hide under the bed, or u can work through the knots.'

last week i came to my dads house to visit and watch my grandmother for a month. my grandmother speaks not a single word of english. lucky me. i know a lot of spanish but i can understand a lot more than i can speak. so its difficult sometimes. there really isnt anything to do here. i just made some friends a few days ago and they r pretty kool. they're not really close to my age tho. they r either younger or older than me. i have lots of fun just chillin with them, and when im not chillin with them im home with my abuela, on the computer, watching tv, or sleeping.

last night i was chillin with one of my guy friends from down here and he was puttin a hard game on me. he's one of those guys that when he wants something he'll get it and he is trying to get with me. im trying hard to resist but the stuff he does is so cute, yet phoney. you know how it is.

 i recently saw the movie Dirty Dancing Havana Nights and that got me interested in gettin into my cuban backround. i also want to visit cuba wen i get old enough. my dad sed he'll take me when communism goes away and who knows when that will be. but i think ill have a great time there. hopefully ill meet a nice cuban man that knows how to have fun and how to treat a lady. thats what im looking for right now. lol. but um, that movie got me thinking. i saw it twice and i re-rented it bcz im gonna watch it even more. *dork* i kno ima dork. u can say it. but yea. if u havent seen it, you must. there is SEXXE dancing and a cute love story.

 marina is going to be visiting me for a weekend here. she's comming this friday. this should b fun. we're gonna b chillin with my new friends and just going to the mall and the movies so its gonna b cool. just chillin like the good ol' days. so i cant wait for that. when i go back home im going to b with my babie ian. he's my best friend. we're gonna go to his old town and chill with his boys there. that should b really fun. so im excited. lol. im really chill with one of his cuban friends and we've been talking a lot lately so im really excited to see him. but it will b all good. we'll b chillin for a while n it will b great. over the past couple days ive been having headaches like crazy. tylenol isnt helping me at all. im dying over here. i dont kno y im getting them though. i used to wear glasses but i dont ne more. that could b y. i spend my entire day on the computer. that could also be y. i strain my eyes a lot to see things. that could also b y. but i dunno. im gettin an eye exam when i get back from here. and hopefully while im here i should b getting my permit. so im very excited. =]

after marina leaves im getting a professional picture taken with both of my sisters so i cant wait for that. it should b so cute. and then i will b able to show everyone the picture and they can b like "aww u guys look so alike" lol. and etc. but it will b my first professional picture in a while.i want to do a lot here but i have so many restrictions.

ima b off now. my headache is comming back. <3

just watched dirty dancing havana nights. it was a cute movie. lots of love. there were certain parts where it made me smile and a tear rolled down my face. then there were 'oh no' parts with a tear of sadness. lol. it was a good movie if u like romance and dancing. very inspirational to beginner dancers. now i really wanna take salsa lessons. it also made me wanna fall in love with a romantic hispanic man! lol. ima dork. i know.

'Afro-Cuban dance,its the dance of slaves.when they dance it was their only time to feel free. It's a dance about exactly who you want to be in that moment. It has to feel and look as natural as the waves. Coming and going.'

=]

this morning i got woken up by my lil sister jumpin on me and screaming "wake up!" at 9 and then the cleaning ladies came at 1030..joyous..my dad made his special breakfast this morning..it consists eggs, ham, salsa, olives, and a LOT of cheese..=]..it was small but very filling..Good Stuff..

i was watching a video with lisa today. it was of her family and in the past how they would put together lil skits on Thanksgiving. it was pretty cute stuff. very religious and they did it a lot. one of her cuzins made an actual film of the highlights over the past 10 years. pretty impressive. made me wanna cry bcz i wish i had a traditional family like that. she sed this Thanksgiving i can go there and be apart of her family. how nice =]. id love to b apart of the family.

last night my grandmother fell out of the car. she hurt her knee so now i have to pay even more attention to her than i was before. how fun. i hope she is alright. she's really old and doesnt speak any english, but shes a kick ass abuela. shes a trooper.

next weekend mai is supposed to come up here to chill. i cant wait. it should b really fun. i havent seen her since june! i miss her. while we're both down here we're going to be chilling with my *new friends* =] lol. mayb visiting frankie if we can. we'll see though. 

i wanna take salsa lessons. my next goal. payce
